page.title: 04ST DAY FEAST.
page.content: On St Day Feast Day I went to school in the morning and did normal lessons. In the afternoon I changed into my best dress ready for the dance. At 2 o'clock we lined up in the playground and found our partners. Then we marched through the gate and through the village to Mills Street and there we stopped while the band played "The Lord's my Shepherd" and another hymn. When we got to the playing-field we put our flowers on the Mills memorial. We got ready for the dance and we found our partners again.When we did start to dance it started to pour down with rain. After that we had a{Safron {Bun,}a bottle of pop and 50p.Then it was time for the races.When we got home Mummy said we must have been doing the rain dance instead of the Feast Dance.
